attributes.action: remove all none elected people, viz appointed peers, from government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is an insult to our democracy that there is a growing trend to appoint members of the house of lords to government and cabinet positions.

The outturn is that any government can manipulate, or be manipulated, without those concerned ever having stood for democratic election.  

This is not right and not democratic..
